title: Adc main lf duo (bronze-gold)
body:
My other account is plat 4. Im gna push this to gold for rewards. 

Id prefer a support main, i dont care if you are bronze 5 - gold 1. Id prefer ardent supports, lulu/janna/nami so i can carry.

Add me ingame - Big Jim

replies.body: Added I got G2 last season, I wanna get there again 100% keen! I added you in game.
